com.radirius.merc.geo

Class Vec2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.merc.geo.Vec
      • com.radirius.merc.geo.Vec2

  • public class Vec2
extends Vec
    A Vector that contains 2 values: x and y. This class makes vector math easy, and makes your life a whole lot easier.
    Author:
    wessles
